Arduino
-------
Arduino is an open source electronics platform
that is a great for both adults and kids.
https://www.w3schools.com/cs/index.php


Snap Circuits
-------------
`Snap Circuits <https://www.w3schools.com/cs/index.php>`_
is a great electronics learning platform consisting 
of plastic board and electronics compoenents that
you snap together based on project guides to learn
basic electronics concepts.
